Info.Notice: Notice: Due to copyright, licensing and other legal restrictions, Rail Map Generator uses Noto Serif CJK and Vegur instead of MTRSung and Myriad Pro respectively for MTR-style maps. If you have obtained the license of either font, please feel free to edit the relevant code chunk of the exported SVG file.
